sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY batchType,intfId) ROWNO, B.BzwkDsticName, A.batchType , A.intfId , A.intfName , A.intfDesc , A.sndAdptrCd , A.sndAdptrCdSeq, A.sndAdptrCd || '[' || TO_CHAR(A.sndAdptrCdSeq) || ']' AS sndAdptrCdStr, substr(A.intfStartDate,1,8) AS intfStartDate, substr(A.intfEndDate,1,8) AS intfEndDate, A.delYn , A.eventCallVal FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 B WHERE A.workGrpCd = B.EAIBzwkDstcd AND A.workGrpCd IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.delYn = #searchDelYn#
A.batchType = #searchBatchType#
( A.intfName LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' OR A.intfId LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' )
A.intfId IN (SELECT intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 WHERE ftpHostname LIKE #searchFtpHostname# )
A.intfId IN (SELECT intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 WHERE rmtSevrFTPUID LIKE #searchRmtSevrFTPUID# )
A.intfId IN (SELECT T2.intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 T1, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 T2 WHERE T1.jndiDatasource LIKE #searchJndi# AND T1.adptrCd=T2.adptrCd )
ORDER BY batchType,intfId
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(A.intfId) AS TotalCount FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 B WHERE A.workGrpCd = B.EAIBzwkDstcd AND A.workGrpCd IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.delYn = #searchDelYn#
A.batchType = #searchBatchType#
( A.intfName LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' OR A.intfId LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' )
A.intfId IN (SELECT intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 WHERE ftpHostname LIKE #searchFtpHostname# )
A.intfId IN (SELECT intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 WHERE rmtSevrFTPUID LIKE #searchRmtSevrFTPUID# )
A.intfId IN (SELECT T2.intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 T1, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 T2 WHERE T1.jndiDatasource LIKE #searchJndi# AND T1.adptrCd=T2.adptrCd )

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04( intfId, intfName, intfDesc, workGrpCd, Level4, sndAdptrCd, sndAdptrCdSeq, batchType, regDate, regUserid, modDate, modUserid, intfStartDate, intfEndDate, delYn, eventCallVal, postJobHostName, postJobPortNoName, postJobUID, postJobUserPwdName, postJobCmd, sizeOnce, procTerm, reqChgr, reqChgrTlno, resChgr, resChgrTlno ) VALUES ( #intfId#, #intfName#, #intfDesc#, #workGrpCd#, #Level4#, #sndAdptrCd#, #sndAdptrCdSeq#, #batchType#, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), #userid #, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), #userid#, NVL(#intfStartDate#,TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3')), NVL(#intfEndDate#,'99991231235959'), #delYn#, #eventCallVal#, #postJobHostName#, #postJobPortNoName#, #postJobUID#, #postJobUserPwdName#, #postJobCmd#, #sizeOnce#, #procTerm#, #reqChgr#, #reqChgrTlno#, #resChgr#, #resChgrTlno# )

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 SET intfName = #intfName#, intfDesc = #intfDesc#, Level4 = #Level4#, sndAdptrCd = #sndAdptrCd#, sndAdptrCdSeq = #sndAdptrCdSeq#, modDate = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), modUserid = #userid#, intfStartDate = NVL(#intfStartDate#,intfStartDate), intfEndDate = NVL(#intfEndDate#,intfEndDate), delYn = #delYn#, eventCallVal = #eventCallVal#, postJobHostName = #postJobHostName#, postJobPortNoName = #postJobPortNoName#, postJobUID = #postJobUID#, postJobUserPwdName = #postJobUserPwdName#, postJobCmd = #postJobCmd#, sizeOnce = #sizeOnce#, procTerm = #procTerm#, reqChgr = #reqChgr#, reqChgrTlno = #reqChgrTlno#, resChgr = #resChgr#, resChgrTlno = #resChgrTlno# WHERE intfId = #intfId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY workGrpCd, adptrCd, adptrCdSeq) ROWNO, TBL.* FROM ( SELECT A.workGrpCd , C.BzwkDsticName, B.adptrCd , B.adptrCdSeq , B.sqlName , B.sqlNameDesc , A.adptrKind , A.sndRcvKind , B.intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 B, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C WHERE A.adptrCd = B.adptrCd AND A.workGrpCd = C.EAIBzwkDstcd AND A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd# AND A.sndRcvKind = #searchSndRcvKind# AND A.adptrKind = #searchAdptrKind#
B.sqlName LIKE '%' || #searchAdptrName# || '%'
UNION ALL SELECT A.workGrpCd , C.BzwkDsticName, B.adptrCd , B.adptrCdSeq , B.ftpName , B.ftpNameDesc , A.adptrKind , A.sndRcvKind , B.intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 B, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C WHERE A.adptrCd = B.adptrCd AND A.workGrpCd = C.EAIBzwkDstcd AND A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd# AND A.sndRcvKind = #searchSndRcvKind# AND A.adptrKind = #searchAdptrKind#
B.ftpName LIKE '%' || #searchAdptrName# || '%'
ORDER BY workGrpCd, adptrCd, adptrCdSeq ) TBL )ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.workGrpCd , C.BzwkDsticName, B.adptrCd , B.adptrCdSeq , B.sqlName , B.sqlNameDesc , A.adptrKind , A.sndRcvKind , B.intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 B, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C WHERE A.adptrCd = B.adptrCd AND A.workGrpCd = C.EAIBzwkDstcd AND A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd# AND A.sndRcvKind = #searchSndRcvKind# AND A.adptrKind = #searchAdptrKind#
B.sqlName LIKE '%' || #searchAdptrName# || '%'
UNION ALL SELECT A.workGrpCd , C.BzwkDsticName, B.adptrCd , B.adptrCdSeq , B.ftpName , B.ftpNameDesc , A.adptrKind , A.sndRcvKind , B.intfId FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 B, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C WHERE A.adptrCd = B.adptrCd AND A.workGrpCd = C.EAIBzwkDstcd AND A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd# AND A.sndRcvKind = #searchSndRcvKind# AND A.adptrKind = #searchAdptrKind#
B.ftpName LIKE '%' || #searchAdptrName# || '%'
ORDER BY workGrpCd, adptrCd, adptrCdSeq )
